SELECT t1.*, t3.name group_name, t4.name com_name, t5.name dpt_name, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT t6.name ) role_name, t7.id position_id, t7.name position_name FROM staff t1 LEFT JOIN staff_orginfo t2 ON t1.id = t2.staff_id
and t2.org_id = #{param.orgId}
LEFT JOIN org t3 ON t3.id = t2.group_id LEFT JOIN org t4 ON t4.id = t2.com_id LEFT JOIN org t5 ON t5.id = t2.dpt_id LEFT JOIN `position` t7 on t7.id = t2.position_id LEFT JOIN sys_role t6 on t6.id in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = t1.id)
AND t1.state = #{param.state}
AND t1.state = 1
AND t1.id in (select staff_id from staff_orginfo where org_id = #{param.orgId})
AND t1.is_manager = #{param.isManager}
AND ( t1.name like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%') or t1.mobile like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%') )
AND t1.id in (select user_id from sys_user_role where role_id = (select id from sys_role where name = #{param.role}))
AND t1.deleted != 1
GROUP BY t1.id order by t1.id desc
select t1.id, t1.name from staff t1 where t1.id in (select staff_id from staff_orginfo where com_id = #{comId})
select t1.openid from wx_access t1 where t1.id = (select wx_access_id from staff where id = #{id})
